title: shankara purahara
sahitya:
shankara purahara sadAshivA nin caraNam sharaNam jaya mahAdEvA (Om)


anupallavi

  pon karavuDan iLam tingaL aNiyum varamangaLa nAyakA gangAdharanE


caraNam    mangaLam aruL mangai maruvum oru bhangApaTa aravu kankaNa maNi kara
 pankaja sharaN paNiyum guNa aDiyavar sankaTa aghala varum karuNai nIdE
